

## Sampling Toolset

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("images/network/Data Management_Sampling.png")
```


```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.tree)
library(networkD3)

tools_todo_df <- read_csv("auxiliary_files/tools_todo_df.csv")

tools_todo_df %>%
  filter(toolbox == "Data Management", toolset == "Sampling") %>% 
  transmute(tool = paste(toolset, tool, sep = "/")) %>% 
  as.Node(pathName = "tool") %>%
  ToListExplicit(unname = TRUE) %>%
  diagonalNetwork()
```
